title: Cross-compile to windows using clang fails

labels.name: A-linkage
labels.description: Area: linking into static, shared libraries and binaries

labels.name: A-LLVM
labels.description: Area: Code generation parts specific to LLVM. Both correctness bugs and optimization-related issues.

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Trying to cross-compile to Windows (`x86_64-pc-windows-gnu`) with clang and lld fails as it tries to use the `--enable-long-section-names` which lld does not have.


```
$ cargo build --target x86_64-pc-windows-gnu --release

[…]

error: linking with `/opt/llvm-mingw/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-clang` failed: exit code: 1
  |
  = note: "/opt/llvm-mingw/bin/x86_64-w64-mingw32-clang" "-Wl,--enable-long-section-names" "-fno-use-linker-plugin" "-Wl,--nxcompat" "-nostdlib" "-m64" "/Users/epirat/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/lib/crt2.o" "/Users/epirat/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/lib/rsbegin.o" "-L" "/Users/epirat/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/lib" "/Users/epirat/Projects/Xiph/rav1e/target/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/release/deps/rav1e-3ebcab94614634e6.rav1e.f1hmcp4a-cgu.0.rcgu.o" "-o" "/Users/epirat/Projects/Xiph/rav1e/target/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/release/deps/rav1e-3ebcab94614634e6.exe" "-Wl,--gc-sections" "-nodefaultlibs" "-L" "/Users/epirat/Projects/Xiph/rav1e/target/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/release/deps" "-L" "/Users/epirat/Projects/Xiph/rav1e/target/release/deps" "-L" "/Users/epirat/Projects/Xiph/rav1e/target/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/release/build/rav1e-dee324652f9ee6b3/out" "-L" "/Users/epirat/Projects/Xiph/rav1e/target/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/release/build/backtrace-sys-aa8258246cea5e3b/out" "-L" "/Users/epirat/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/lib" "-Wl,-Bstatic" "/var/folders/rw/l97gj1cd6vd_wrf_zjcbycjc0000gn/T/rustczwOM4v/librav1e-86661c8647a023d9.rlib" "-Wl,--start-group" "/var/folders/rw/l97gj1cd6vd_wrf_zjcbycjc0000gn/T/rustczwOM4v/libbacktrace_sys-5b88348e86e9c408.rlib" "-Wl,--end-group" "/Users/epirat/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/lib/libcompiler_builtins-91d156b34cedc8e4.rlib" "-Wl,-Bdynamic" "-ladvapi32" "-lws2_32" "-luserenv" "-Wl,-Bstatic" "-lgcc_eh" "-lpthread" "-Wl,-Bdynamic" "-lmingwex" "-lmingw32" "-lgcc" "-lmsvcrt" "-lmsvcrt" "-luser32" "-lkernel32" "/Users/epirat/.rustup/toolchains/nightly-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/x86_64-pc-windows-gnu/lib/rsend.o"
  = note: lld: error: unknown argument: --enable-long-section-names
          clang-8: error: linker command failed with exit code 1 (use -v to see invocation)


error: aborting due to previous error
```
